properties.description: Necessary property for a form
properties.name: _formelement

properties.description: Object with usefull information
properties.name: _misc

properties.description: Object with usefull information
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Object that contains the different subinputs
properties.name: _subInputs

properties.description: Label for the element
properties.name: label

properties.description: Locale to be used in the datebox
properties.name: locale

properties.description: Date format of the input
properties.name: mask

properties.description: Indicates the superior limit of the date
properties.name: max

properties.description: Indicates the inferior limit of the date
properties.name: min

properties.description: Name to identify the element in a form
properties.name: name

properties.description: Indicates the font size of the datepicker
properties.name: pickerFontSize

properties.description: Indicates the height of the datepicker
properties.name: pickerHeight

properties.description: Indicates the selectable values of the datepicker (day, month and year)
properties.name: pickerSelectable

properties.description: Indicates the width of the datepicker
properties.name: pickerWidth

properties.description: Indicates the separator for the date
properties.name: separator

properties.description: Indicates whether its in toolbar mode or not
properties.name: toolbar

properties.description: Value of the element
properties.name: value

properties.description: Indicates the format of the value
properties.name: valueFormat

properties.description: Indicates the format of the weekdays header
properties.name: weekDaysFormat

properties.description: Indicates the first day of the week for the datepicker
properties.name: weekStart

properties.description: Indicates the width of the datebox
properties.name: width

methods.description: Hides the datepicker if its not being targeted
methods.name: _customBlur

methods.description: function_description
methods.name: _getCaretPosition

methods.description: We replace the format with the given data, in case the field's length is lower than its format then we add 0 as needed
methods.name: _getFormattedValue

methods.description: Gets the selected text
methods.name: _getSelectionText

methods.description: Handles the date correction for months and days
methods.name: _handleCorrection

methods.description: Moves the cursor to the right when a subinput is being focused
methods.name: _handleFocus

methods.description: Handles the typing and the date correction, if the subinput reaches its limit it jumpes to the next one
methods.name: _handleKeyDown

methods.description: Handles the key up event
methods.name: _handleKeyUp

methods.description: Handles the limits such as min/max date
methods.name: _handleLimits

methods.description: Hides the picker
methods.name: _hideDatePicker

methods.description: Returns true if the month is equal/higher than the max month
methods.name: _isMaxMonth

methods.description: Returns true if the month is equal/lower than the min month
methods.name: _isMinMonth

methods.description: Whether the recieved key event has a numeric value or not
methods.name: _isNumeric

methods.description: Triggered when the user selects a day on the datePicker
methods.name: _onDatePickerSelection

methods.description: Here we setup everything we need for the element
methods.name: _setup

methods.description: Sets up the blur events for the subinputs
methods.name: _setupBlurEvents

methods.description: Sets up the datePicker and appends it to the datebox
methods.name: _setupDatePicker

methods.description: Sets up the triggers to display/hide the datepicker
methods.name: _setupDatePickerTrigger

methods.description: Sets up the events for the subinputs
methods.name: _setupEvents

methods.description: Sets up the focus events for the subinputs
methods.name: _setupFocusEvents

methods.description: Sets up the mask and the subinputs to be used for the user input
methods.name: _setupMask

methods.description: Sets up the superior limit of the date
methods.name: _setupMinDate

methods.description: Sets up the inferior limit of the date
methods.name: _setupMinDate

methods.description: Sets up basic properties for the data object
methods.name: _setupMisc

methods.description: Sets up the keydown events for the subinputs
methods.name: _setupOnKeyDownEvents

methods.description: Sets up the keyup events for the subinputs
methods.name: _setupOnKeyUpEvents

methods.description: Sets up the events for the subinputs to prevent paste
methods.name: _setupPasteEvents

methods.description: Creates some fast access elements so that theres no need for calling the QuerySelector all the time.
methods.name: _setupRefs

methods.description: Adds whats needed to overwrite the default style
methods.name: _setupToolbarMode

methods.description: Shows the picker
methods.name: _showDatePicker

methods.description: Shows/Hides the picker depending on its state
methods.name: _toggleDatePicker

methods.description: Updates the label node with the new label
methods.name: _updateLabel

methods.description: Validates if what the user typed is a valid date
methods.name: _validateDate

methods.description: Allows the user tu set a new value to the element
methods.name: setValue
